item.description:
Let's end the year with a Pat's win!  Last weekend was so much fun, and it's soooo much fun to watch the game with others, this may be a regular event until we make to Chunky's again for the Superbowl?

Please bring some shoes or slippers to change into so my floors don't get soaking wet from this snow mess, bring something to share if you like and park on the side of the street the house is on.

My address will be sent to those who reply "yes".  I've lmited to a dozen people, as I have a decent size house, but seating for the game is limited ;)

The game starts at 4:25 so if you want to get here about 3:30, that would work.

And a Happy and Blessed New Year to all my "meetup" friends, near and far.  Hope to see you all soon, (even those who have not yet attended a meetup).

GO PATS!

Suz
item.how_to_find_us: look for the santa lit up in front of the porch
item.name: Patriots vs. Dolphins my house in Pelham, NH
